pages.text: Then indeed you, the misguided deniers
are certainly eaters of Zaqqum tree
and filling the stomachs from it
then drinking boiling water over it
and drinking as thirsty camels drink
This is their entertainment on the judgment day
We created you, so why do you not acknowledge
What do you think of what you ejaculate
Do you create it or are We the creators
We mandated the death among you, and We will not be surpassed
in replacing (you with) the likes of you and producing you in (a form) that you do not know
You have certainly known about the first creation, so why do you not take notice
What do you think of what you plant
Do you grow it, or are We the growers
If We want, We make it into broken pieces, and leave you wondering
(saying): we certainly suffered losses
no, but we are deprived
What do you think of the water that you drink
Did you send it down from the cloud, or are We the senders
If We want, We make it bitter (and salty), so why are you not thankful
What do you think of the fire that you light
Did you make its tree, or are We the makers
We made it a reminder and a provision for those living/traveling in the desert
So glorify the name of your great Master
So I swear by positions of the stars
and it is a great oath if you knew
